turf.translation[0].definitions[0].defin: a surface that consists of soil with grass on top, or an artificial surface that looks like this
turf.translation[0].definitions[1].defin: a square piece of turf cut out of the ground
turf.translation[0].definitions[2].defin: an area that you think of as being your own
turf.translation[0].definitions[2].examp: How vigorously will the local companies defend their turf?
We beat Canada on their home turf.
turf.translation[1].definitions[0].defin: to cover an area of land with turf
